dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I am on a quest to find the legendary Sword of Truth.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, the Sword of Truth. A dangerous quest, but a noble one.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I am prepared for the dangers. I have trained for many years and I am confident in my abilities.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Then I wish you luck on your quest. May the gods be with you.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Thank you. I will need all the help I can get.
